description: Katou Saburou is the leader of the Black Tiger fighter squadron (second in authority to Kodai), Kato is a gifted and a level-headed pilot, often putting his life on the line for his comrades. In the second season he is leader of the first squadron of the Cosmo Tigers, piloting a later model of fighter craft and stationed on the Moon. He and his men volunteer to join the Yamato under Kodai`s command.
name: Katou Saburou
